sentences.en: He was trying to get a pecuniary advantage for himself.
Paroxysmal crisis incident often can bring severe impact to aviation transportation enterprises, cause huge pecuniary loss.
sentences.cn: 突发性危机事件往往会对航空运输企业带来严重的冲击, 并造成巨大的经济损失.

sentences.en: Recoverable pecuniary damage is a diminution of the victim's patrimony caused by the damaging event.
sentences.cn: 可回复的财产损害指受害人在损害事件中遭受的财物的减少.

sentences.en: Second, the writer probes into some special issues in non - pecuniary damage compensation.
sentences.cn: 其次对目前 非 财产损害赔偿中争议较大的特殊问题作了深入的讨论.

sentences.en: She is so independent that she refused all pecuniary aid.
sentences.cn: 她很独立,所以拒绝一切金钱上的资助.

sentences.en: She seemed averse to being under pecuniary obligations.
sentences.cn: 她似乎不愿在经济上仰人鼻息.

sentences.en: Some compromise between the psychological and pecuniary consideration must therefore be sought.
sentences.cn: 因之,我们不得不在心理上的考虑和金钱上的考虑两者之间谋取折衷妥协.

sentences.en: SOME people do science for its own sake. Others may be lured by pecuniary rewards.
sentences.cn: 有些人搞科学是为了自己的利益, 另一些人可能贪图于金钱的奖励.

sentences.en: The average pecuniary loss that complained a case last year is 931 dollars.
sentences.cn: 去年投诉案件的平均经济损失为931美元.

sentences.en: The insurance company will compensate you for pecuniary loss in the snow disaster.
sentences.cn: 保险公司会赔偿你在雪灾中所蒙受的经济损失.

sentences.en: The third part is about the scope of compensation for non - pecuniary damage.
sentences.cn: 第三部分, 非 财产损害赔偿的适用范围.

sentences.en: Totally, there is a trend that the scope of indemnified non - pecuniary damages have gradually expanded.
sentences.cn: 总的来说, 可赔偿的 非 财产损害的范围有逐渐扩大的趋势.

sentences.en: We do not get any pecuniary benefit from the work.
sentences.cn: 我们没从这项工作中得到任何金钱上的好处.

sentences.en: When you get clear of your pecuniary embarrasments, you will rejoice.
sentences.cn: 你排除了一切经济困难的时候, 你会很快乐的.

sentences.en: Why not make a pecuniary sacrifice?
sentences.cn: 为什么不能在用度上紧缩一点 呢 ?

sentences.en: You can train me by the angle pecuniary aid of investment.
sentences.cn: 您可以以投资的角度资助培训我.

trans.tran_en: relating to or consisting of money
